      • qrem.common
        • This subpackage qrem.common provides a suite of utility modules specifically tailored for the QREM project. It encompasses a range of functionalities from configuration loading to mathematical computations and file operations in the context of Quantum Error Mitigation (QEM).

qrem.common.external

This subpackage contains external packages and modules adapted to be used in QREM package. Ultimately, we would like to remove this subpackage and use external packages directly, but for now it is necessary to keep them modified internally.

All subpagases and modules are listed below:

Modules

ncpol2sdpa

Ncpol2SDPA package by Peter Wittek, updated with minor bug fixes. Currently available version of PyPI requires some fixes.

hyperplane_projections

Adapted from https://github.com/Hannoskaj/Hyperplane_Intersection_Projection, with some minor modifications.

CBB

Adapted from Flavio Baccari’s code, with some minor modifications.

  • qrem.common.external.CBB
    • qrem.common.external.CBB.branchandbound_tools
    • qrem.common.external.CBB.spin_models
  • qrem.common.external.ncpol2sdpa

    • qrem.common.external.ncpol2sdpa.mosek_utils
    • qrem.common.external.ncpol2sdpa.nc_utils
    • qrem.common.external.ncpol2sdpa.physics_utils
    • qrem.common.external.ncpol2sdpa.picos_utils
    • qrem.common.external.ncpol2sdpa.rdm_hierarchy
    • qrem.common.external.ncpol2sdpa.sdp_relaxation
